fields_of_interest: Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Policies and initiatives concerning health system development, particularly those which may affect the physical infrastructure of healthcare systems and organisations, including the planning, design, construction and financing of all kinds of healthcare buildings and technologies.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: The EuHPN organises regional knowledge sharing events on a regular basis, as well as an annual conference for members and guests.  The network regularly collaborates with other trans-European organisations and EC-funded project groups.
goals__remit: Our aim is to promote better standards and more effective investment in, and management of, health property throughout the EU, by using our network capability to enable members to pool and share knowledge, and to keep pace with leading edge developments in this central dimension of health care.
